Specification: On-chip memory: 256 KB code flash, 40 KB SRAM, 4 KB data flash memory
Size: 53 mm x 85 mm; thickness: 1.6 mm
Board supply: 5 V. VCC: 3.3 V. MCU operation voltage range 2.7 V to 3.6 V
USB connector: VBUS (5 V input); VBUS is converted to 3.3 V by LDO
Reset switch x 1; user switch x 1
Power indicator: green x 1, user: green x 2, On-board debugger ACT LED: yellow x 1
Connector: 6-pin x 1, 8-pin x 2, 10-pin x 1 The interface is compatible with ArduinoTM Uno R3
